title: Instagram Profile Scraper
description: Scrapes Instagram profiles to extract user information including username, bio, follower count, and optionally recent posts. Designed to respect rate limits and avoid detection.

profileUrls.title: Instagram Profile URLs
profileUrls.description: List of Instagram profile URLs to scrape. Each URL should point to a public Instagram profile (e.g., https://instagram.com/username)

proxy.title: Proxy Configuration
proxy.description: Proxy settings to avoid IP blocking. Recommended to use Apify Proxy for better success rates.

includeRecentPosts.title: Include Recent Posts
includeRecentPosts.description: Whether to scrape recent posts from each profile. This will increase scraping time but provide more data.
includeRecentPosts.groupDescription: Configure whether and how many recent posts to scrape from each profile

maxPostsToScrape.title: Maximum Posts to Scrape
maxPostsToScrape.description: Maximum number of recent posts to scrape per profile (only applies if 'Include Recent Posts' is enabled)

maxRetries.title: Maximum Retries
maxRetries.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed requests
maxRetries.sectionDescription: Fine-tune the scraper's behavior and performance

delay.title: Delay Between Requests
delay.description: Delay in milliseconds between requests to avoid being detected as a bot

outputFormat.title: Output Data Fields
outputFormat.description: Select which data fields to include in the output
